allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf: optimize data loading, memoization, and bundle size

- Add limits and orderBy to Firestore collection hooks to reduce reads
- Replace N per-client intervention plan listeners with single collectionGroup query
- Memoize DataContext value and wrap AuthContext methods with useCallback
- Use Map + day-grouped events for O\(1\) lookups in MonthView calendar
- Dynamic import analytics charts and jsPDF to reduce initial bundle
- Memo-wrap all analytics chart components
- Cache Intl.NumberFormat instance for currency formatting
- Add optimizePackageImports for lucide-react, recharts, firebase, jspdf
- Add next-pwa graceful fallback when package is missing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add programs management UI and fix programs loading

- Fix usePrograms\(\) orderBy field from "name" to "title"
- Add Services | Programs tab toggle on /services page
- Create ProgramCard, ProgramList, AddProgramModal, EditProgramModal
- Allow coordinators and therapists to write to programs collection
- Add collectionGroup Firestore rules and index for interventionPlans
- Denormalize clientId in CreatePlanModal for security rules
- Remove duplicate NotificationProvider from parent layout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
